bcbioRNASeq

Plot Individual Genes

Plot Individual Genes

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeqANY
plotGene(object, interestingGroup,
  normalized = "tpm", gene, format = "symbol")

Arguments

object

Object.
interestingGroup

Category to use to group samples (color and shape). If unset, this is automatically determined by the metadata set inside the bcbioRNADataSet.
normalized

Normalization method. Supports tpm (default), tmm, rlog, or vst.
gene

Gene identifier. Can input multiple genes as a character vector.
format

Ensembl identifier format. Supports symbol (default) or ensgene.

Value

ggplot.

See also

DESeq2::plotCounts().

Other Quality Control Plots: plot53Bias, plotCountDensity, plotCountsPerGene, plotExonicMappingRate, plotGenderMarkers, plotGeneSaturation, plotGenesDetected, plotIntronicMappingRate, plotMappedReads, plotMappingRate, plotRRNAMappingRate, plotTotalReads

Examples

data(bcb)
genes <- c("Sulf1", "Phf3")

# bcbioRNASeq
plotGene(bcb, gene = genes)
plotGene(bcb, gene = genes, interestingGroup = "group")
#> Error in grid.Call.graphics(C_setviewport, vp, TRUE): non-finite location and/or size for viewport
